𒌓 TAM time
𒌓 UTU a day 𒁺 DU day in 𒌓𒌓𒁺 sunrise 𒁺 DU day सूर्योदय sūryoday ಸೂರ್ಯೋದಯ sūryōdaya 𒌓𒌓𒁺 sunrise 𒁺 RE₆ ri₆ ra₂ 𓍟 rise 𓇳 𓇶 roj

𓏏 𓋁 𓏮 | sunrise | dawn day طوغمه doğma طوغ doğ- “to be born” + مه -ma 𒌉 DUMU ≈ doğmak Tag

दिहाड़ा dihāṛā houra < 𓋴𓅱𓇳𓏥 sahra օր ɔɾ 𓇳 ray ruz

𓎆 ≈ dayn in 𓂋𓎆𓎆𓎆 = 1/30 = one day

𒅎 𒈬 im-mu PIE ἦμαρ êmar “day” ἡμέρᾱ hēmérā *h₂eh₃mr̥ “heat”
𒅎𒈬 daytime, heat (of day)

天 Theon *deywós “god” 帝 dì 天主 天神 老天

𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𐍃𐌹𐌽𐍄𐌴𐌹𐌽𐍃 daily ⇔ syn sun turn

𓇋 𓏏 𓂋 𓇳 iteration, duration, time ⇔ waters
𓇋 𓍿 𓂋 𓅱 𓆴 seasons, iterations
𓏏 𓂋 𓅱 𓆵 3 seasons |three-suns
𓏏 𓂋 𓆵 𓇳 time, season|turn,time (𓂋 as rm) ⇔ 𓆵 year,yaum

𒀭𒌋𒌋𒌋 Sun 三 Sin ☾☾☾ 3 moon тян turns 𓇶 ⇔ train Träume Tränen 𓁿𓇲
𒌋𒌋𒌋 Three weeks of ten days = month
𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 Sundra Sahvra 日 ri ruz रोज़ roz रोज roj rays 𓇶 @ saRah rana ⇔ run Rad

𒌓 UTU ⋍ 𐎏 DHALta Δ D 𐤃 𓏏𓂧 D δ ≠ iḍ (night)
𒌓 UTU ⋍ 𐎏 DHA ضَوْء ḍawʾ day-light

დღე-ღამე dɣe-ɣame
saRah jarama ⇔ Jahr
saRah jarama ⇔ jourm day
saRah jarama ⇔ ἡμέρᾱ hēmérā
დღე-ღამე dɣe-ɣame यौम yaum יוֹם yom יְמָמָה yemama < shamaim
jsamera 𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 ἡμέρᾱ hēmérā
𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 days/dates Stunden
𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 sjom > yom יוֹם
𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 güne, suns
𓋴 𓋴 𓋴 𓅱 𓇳 𓏥 giorno

The n of døgn was essential: døgn < døgün 𓇳 > sun
The n of døgn, din was (wrongfully) analyzed as plural and thus removed to day,Tag
